explanation: [0-0] A woman in an orange-red saree stands with her back to the camera, atop a building. The background shows pink walls, other brown buildings, green trees, and the sky.
[0-2] The camera then quickly cuts to show two men standing at the edge of the rooftop, one wearing a colorful outfit and the other looking at a camera.
